title: Denta Shift, Capstone Project
description: A Full Stack application using React, Node.js, Express, MySQL for the front-end and back-end. A web app created for dental professionals and dental offices to find each other.

title: Industry Hackathon - Winning Project
description: Front-end lead of a team of 4. A 24 hour hackathon sponsored by Telus with the aim of tackling the theme: Consumers are experiencing option paralysis. The solution: a feature with Artificial Intelligence that provides a list of shows that you may like based on an entry and where you can find them.

title: Instock
description: An Inventory Management website that was built in collaboration with three of my peers using all we learned and adding MySQL, Knex.js, Jira and Gitflow best practices.

title: Hackathon #2: Purely Chic
description: Lead of the front-end. Given 8 hours and a team of 3, were taked with building a full-stack application using React, Node.js and Express.js for the front-end and the back-end

title: BrainFlix
description: Using React and Axios for the front-end nd Node.js with Express.js for the back-end I was able to build a full-stack application similar to YouTube.

title: Hackathon #1: Your fav quotes
description: Joining a team of 2, we were tasked with building a functioning application in 4 hours using HTML, CSS/Sass, JS for the front-end, and Axios to pull data from an external API.

title: Band Site
description: A project with JS and axios to build a more interactive and dynamic page.

title: Coffee Shop
description: Using HTML, CSS/Sass + BEM naming conventions, I created a coffee shop landing and menu page.
